createCodes(Node, StringBuilder) - Method in class huffman.tools.Compresser
Traverses the Huffman tree recursively, assigning a binary code to each leaf.
createLeaves(int[]) - Method in class huffman.tools.Compresser
Goes through all 128 characters in the ASCII table, and creates and enqueues a node for every character with a frequency greater than 0.
